description: The Advanced Placement Program allows students to take college-level courses and exams while still in high school.
The Specialist High Skills Major (SHSM) in Business provides students with a strong foundation in business education.
Bill Crothers Secondary School offers the High Performance Athlete (HPA) and SHSM programs, supporting students who strive for excellence both academically and athletically.
Unionville High School offers a range of SHSM, Arts, and STEM programs designed to engage students in creative expression and innovative problem-solving.
Pierre Elliott Trudeau High School provides immersive SHSM and French Immersion (FI) opportunities, allowing students to specialize in career-focused areas while enhancing bilingual proficiency.
St. Roberts Catholic High School offers the International Baccalaureate (IB) program, promoting rigorous academics, international-mindedness, and holistic student development.
Bayview Secondary School features the IB, Gifted, and SHSM programs, fostering critical thinking, academic enrichment, and hands-on career exploration.
Thornhill Secondary School delivers a combination of AP, Gifted, HPA, and SHSM programs, allowing students to accelerate learning and gain real-world career experience.
Dr. G.W. Williams Secondary School supports students through its IB, SHSM, and HPA programs, empowering learners to excel in academic, athletic, and career-oriented pathways.
